metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9656 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The tt_sbit_decoder_load_image function in sfnt/ttsbit.c in FreeType before 2.5.4 does not properly check for an integer overflow, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted OpenType font.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9656` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.4
libfreetype6 - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.4
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> in precise, this code is in src/sfnt/ttsbit0.c

criterions.comment: freetype package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.2-1ubuntu2.4').
